QuestData.Title: A Brief Respite
QuestData.Description:
We have much to do, $n. However, we are all weary and require rest. Decisions made while fatigued are almost always the wrong ones to make.
The Ankoan have offered their home to us, yet they are barely holding on themselves. We should do what we can to support them while we think about our next move.
See what you can do to aid their hunting parties, it may be the only way we survive in this place.
QuestData.LogDescription: Support your allies in Nazjatar by getting one to rank 3.
QuestData.QuestCompletionLog: Return to Lady Jaina Proudmoore in Nazjatar.

Objectives.Objective: Reach rank 3 with an Ankoan ally
